verses.verse: <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> And <S%H8269>princes<s%> will <S%H8323>rule<s%> <S%H4941>justly.<s%>

And <S%H376>each<s%> will be like a <S%H4224>refuge<s%> from the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And a <S%H5643>shelter<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm,<s%> Like <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H6724>dry<s%> <S%H6724>country,<s%> Like the <S%H6738>shade<s%> of a <S%H3515>huge<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> in a <S%H5889>parched<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>
Then the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of those who <S%H7200>see<s%> will not be <S%H9619>blinded,<s%> And the <S%H241>ears<s%> of those who <S%H8085>hear<s%> will <S%H7181>listen.<s%>

And the <S%H3824>mind<s%> of the <S%H4116>hasty<s%> will <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H1847>truth,<s%> And the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H5926>stammerers<s%> will <S%H4116>hasten<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6703>clearly.<s%>
<S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> will the <S%H5036>fool<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5081>noble,<s%> Or the <S%H3596>rogue<s%> be <S%H559>spoken<s%> of [as] <S%H7771>generous.<s%>

For a <S%H5036>fool<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H5039>nonsense,<s%> And his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6213>inclines<s%> toward <S%H205>wickedness,<s%> To <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H2612>ungodliness<s%> and to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8442>error<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> To <S%H9553>keep<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H9553>unsatisfied<s%> And to <S%H2637>withhold<s%> <S%H4945>drink<s%> from the <S%H6771>thirsty.<s%>

As for a <S%H3596>rogue,<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> are <S%H7451>evil;<s%> He <S%H3289>devises<s%> <S%H2154>wicked<s%> <S%H2154>schemes<s%> To <S%H2254>destroy<s%> [the] <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> with <S%H561>slander,<s%> <S%H8267><s%> Even though [the] <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H34>one<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H4941>what<s%> is <S%H4941>right.<s%>
But the <S%H5081>noble<s%> <S%H5081>man<s%> <S%H3289>devises<s%> <S%H5082>noble<s%> <S%H5082>plans;<s%> And by <S%H5082>noble<s%> <S%H5082>plans<s%> he <S%H6965>stands.<s%>

<S%H6965>Rise<s%> up you <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7600>who<s%> are at <S%H7600>ease,<s%> And <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H565>word,<s%> You <S%H982>complacent<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

<S%H5921>Within<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> and [a few] <S%H3117>days,<s%> You will be <S%H7264>troubled,<s%> O <S%H982>complacent<s%> [daughters;] For the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> is <S%H3615>ended,<s%> And the [fruit] <S%H625>gathering<s%> will not <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H2729>Tremble,<s%> you [women] <S%H7600>who<s%> are at <S%H7600>ease;<s%> Be <S%H7264>troubled,<s%> you <S%H982>complacent<s%> [daughters;] <S%H6584>Strip,<s%> <S%H6209>undress,<s%> and <S%H2296>put<s%> [sackcloth] on [your] <S%H2504>waist,<s%>
<S%H5594>Beat<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> for the <S%H2531>pleasant<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> for the <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%>

For the <S%H127>land<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> [in which] <S%H6975>thorns<s%> [and] <S%H8068>briars<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up; <S%H3588>Yea,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4885>joyful<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> [and for] the <S%H5947>jubilant<s%> <S%H7151>city.<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H759>palace<s%> has been <S%H5203>abandoned,<s%> the <S%H1995>populated<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%> <S%H6076>Hill<s%> and watch-tower have <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4631>caves<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> A <S%H4885>delight<s%> for <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkeys,<s%> a <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for <S%H5739>flocks;<s%>

<S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> is <S%H6168>poured<s%> out upon us from on <S%H4791>high,<s%> And the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H1961>becomes<s%> a <S%H3759>fertile<s%> <S%H3759>field<s%> And the <S%H3759>fertile<s%> <S%H3759>field<s%> is <S%H2803>considered<s%> as a <S%H9194>forest.<s%>
Then <S%H4941>justice<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> will <S%H3427>abide<s%> in the <S%H3759>fertile<s%> <S%H3759>field.<s%>

And the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> will be <S%H7965>peace,<s%> And the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H8252>quietness<s%> and <S%H983>confidence<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Then my <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H7965>peaceful<s%> <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> And in <S%H4009>secure<s%> <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> and in <S%H7600>undisturbed<s%> <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>places;<s%>
And it will <S%H1258>hail<s%> when the <S%H9194>forest<s%> <S%H3381>comes<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> And the <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H8218>utterly<s%> <S%H8213>laid<s%> <S%H8213>low.<s%>

How <S%H835>blessed<s%> will you be, you who <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> Who <S%H7971>let<s%> out <S%H7971>freely<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>
